article_title: The VA Should Get Veterans Healthcare From Private Providers

article_metadata.description: BY DANA GOLDMAN AND MARTIN KRIEGER - Many of the health problems affecting the VA population are ones that all Americans face. The private sector has learned how to care for such maladies, and is innovating every day.
article_metadata.author: Capital Flows
